entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:06 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Overcast. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:06 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:06 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
